nodeMetric.field_description: Post Impressions is a count of the total number of times your posts are shown.

body.summary: Post Impressions is a count of the total number of times your posts are shown.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Post Reach, or Unique Impressions, is a count of the number of people who viewed your post at least once.
Post Clicks is the total number of times a post was clicked. This includes, for example, photo views, video plays, and expanding to read a post, but does not include comments, likes, and shares.

Post Likes is a measure of the popularity of social media content. It is the number of likes on your posts on social media platforms such as Facebook or Twitter. It is an indicator of impression numbers and engagement.
